snippet: At Golden Globes parties over the weekend Daniel Day-Lewis was the actor other actors hoped to meet, but among directors it was Benh Zeitlin of "Beasts of the Southern Wild."
abstract: At Golden Globes parties over the weekend Daniel Day-Lewis was the actor other actors hoped to meet, but among directors it was Benh Zeitlin of "Beasts of the Southern Wild."

headline.main: Add Spielberg to the List of 'Beasts' Fans
